For this option, please contact me.The project estimated hrs ( as per the development companies quotations )1- UI-UX design     70 - 80 hrs2- iOS Development    320 - 400 hrs3- Android Development    320 - 400 hrs4- Database and Web Admin panel  160 - 300 hrs5- API and Web Services   360 - 400 hrs6- Quality analysis and Release 40 - 60 hrsProject details and requirements will be shared with the nominated candidate.

title: Town Commercial Guide & APP Guide
desc: I need a person able to work on a template "listing" or "listing pro" and even "superlist" (links of each topic at the end) based on Wordpress to include in them a custom map that we already have marked in Google Maps.The idea is to generate a guide of shops and services of the city and when the person clicks on the pin on the map that indicates a site, open photos and information of the chosen place in question.We have already located all the businesses and services that we intend to include in the project and we have them marked in a custom Google Maps, we also have the idea of ​​using one of the three templates proposed at the beginning, what we would need is a person who can do the integration and configuration so that the site is ready to start uploading the data of each trade / service and can later help us with some adjustment on the web as we work on it, and the APP of the site in the second phase of the project, so that it has similar functionality to the website, with a map and various markers that interact with your GPS and indicate which place exists in that marker and the corresponding information.The site and the app will be in Spanish, but it is not exclusive to speak the language to work on it since we speak English and can communicate without problem.Listable Template (our favorite to work the site) [url removed, login to view]Listing Pro Template (our second choice to work the site) [url removed, login to view]Superlist Template (our last option to work) [url removed, login to view]The first phase is you make a budget for work on the website exclusively and an estimate of what would be cost the development of an APP for IOS and Android.The website will be the first phase of the project, the APP will come soon, we estimate in high season (from here to 3 months onwards).

title: build a multiplayer  game app android and ios
desc: We need an application game developed for android and ios and eventually for pc and mac.here some characteristics:multiplayer onlineis a quiz game competition very similar to " quiz panic" ( made from [url removed, login to view] we need to change avatars and some rules.the game will be composed of 4 turns (Eighth finals, quarter finals, semifinals and the final)1 turn starts when 20 players will be in the same room and like you can see in the quiz panic, based on the correct answers and The time it took for to give the correct answers, Will generate a ranking, so who will be the first classifiedwill go forward to the 2 turn.the 2 turn will be also composed from 20 players that won the first turn.and in the same way the players can go forward to the 3 turn and 4 turn.in conclusion, will partecipate to the 4 turn (final) 20 players that won in a row 1, 2 and 3 turn._______________the avatars have to be animals and  the players can develop their avatar that can grow up from caterpillar till dragon. This will depend on the number of matches that they have played and the number of exact answers that they have guessed.after downloaded the app , for to play, need to make a registration and phone number confirmation (whatsapp style) and security password.for each user created need to have connected a bitcoin wallet becausethe game is pay to play.
